news:
Updates available!

Version 3.3.2.

  • Fixed minor bugs, performed refactoring;
  • Expanded database structure for compatibility with future advanced module versions;
  • Fixed an issue with saving node settings in trees;
  • Added events to reduce the impact of modifiers on the original OpenCart;
  • Fixed a bug in the 'Merge Duplicates' tool;
  • Fixed category attribute errors on the module tab and in the product card;
  • To speed up module loading, the 'Standby Templates' tab has been removed; templates can now be edited directly in the attribute tree;
  • Fixed a bug in the 'Separator Replacement' tool. The issue was related to the '/' separator;
well: You are using the latest version of the Attribut&co module!
links:
Updates will be available at the following links:

  • Liveopencart.ru
